ShiftPatternEntry.name: ShiftPatternEntry
ShiftPatternEntry.description: ShiftPatternEntry links a shift template to a shift pattern.

DayOrder.description: DayOrder links the shift template to the specific day within the shift pattern duration that the template. For example, if the DayOrder is 2 then a shift from the associated template is created on the second day of the pattern.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date that the shift pattern entry was last used.

LastViewedDate.description: The date that the shift pattern entry was last viewed.

Name.description: An auto-generated reference number for the shift pattern entry.

ShiftPatternId.description: The ID of the shift pattern that the shift pattern entry is linked to.

ShiftTemplateId.description: The ID of the shift template thatâ€™s used to create shifts for this shift pattern entry.
